title: MiChigo Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Italian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a separate vegan menu with pizzas, appetizers, salads, and desserts; cooked separately from meat. Located in an eclectic community on Detroit's north side. Free Wi-Fi, TVs. Everything made-in-house using fresh produce obtained locally. Uses green friendly containers where possible.
